Imports

nqcommon, nqtables, snapshot

Types

Tx = ref object
  log: seq[TxLogEntry]
  logDir*: string
  logFile: File
A transaction object which can be used serially to begin and commit multiple transactions. Transactions are started implicitly.

                      tags: [WriteIOEffect, TimeEffect].}
